[Olivia] It's okay. [Markie] It's okay, Pen.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Va tutto bene, Pen.

translation.en: [Olivia] Just take your time. Take it slowly.
[Olivia] Okay, just put one foot in front of the other.
[Olivia] Watch it, okay? Just go slow.
You can do this.
We're right here. We're here for you, okay?
I see her. She's right there. Go, go, go!
Wait. She's on the corner.
[Brad] There she is.
Get that stuff out of the way!
[Lucas] Hey! Pen!
I'm coming! I'm coming!
No, no, no, don't get too close!
If I cheat, if I don't do the dare--
translation.it: Se imbroglio e non eseguo l'obbligo…

translation.en: I know. I know. Okay?
But when you finish, I'll be here to grab you.
translation.it: Ma quando finirai, io sarò qui a prenderti.

translation.en: Just gotta go around this corner now, okay?
[Penelope] Okay.
[Olivia] Come on.
Take your time, okay?
You're doing great, Pen. Don't look down.
translation.it: Stai andando alla grande, Pen. Non guardare giù.

translation.en: -Stay here. Stay below her. -Okay.
translation.it: - Stai qui, sotto di lei. - Ok.

translation.en: Wait. Where are you going?
Hey, Pen, don't look at the fence. Okay?
Look at me, okay? You're almost there. Just a little more.
translation.it: Guarda me. Ci sei quasi. Solo un altro po'.

translation.en: She's right above us. Throw it on top.
translation.it: È sopra di noi. Buttalo lì.

translation.en: -You ready? -Yeah.
That's not gonna work.
That might.
-[Olivia grunts] -Oh! Hey! Penelope!
Shit.
-Guys, get back further. Get back! -Go, go, go.
One last sip.
[Lucas] No. Pen!
Hey! Pen! No! No!
-[Olivia] Pen! -[Markie] She's not moving. [panting]
Is this my bed?
Let it out.
-You're okay. -[cell phone vibrating]
I just got a Facebook message from Giselle.
translation.it: Giselle mi ha mandato un messaggio su Facebook.

translation.en: We're sure this is a good idea, meeting her here?
translation.it: Sicuri che sia una buona idea incontrarla qui?

translation.en: What if the cops trace her message?
translation.it: E se la polizia ha tracciato il messaggio?

translation.en: No, she wrote us on a fake account.
translation.it: Ha scritto su un falso account.

translation.en: Yeah, but that chick lit somebody on fire. She's probably nuts.
translation.it: Sì, ma ha dato fuoco a una persona. Sarà una pazza.

translation.en: [Markie] I mean, do we really have another choice?
We can talk about this inside. Come on.
Let's go.
Inside?
Okay, all right, that's far enough. Tell us what's happening.
translation.it: Ok, qui va bene. Dicci cosa sta succedendo.

translation.en: Which one of you's Olivia?
No, you answer our question first. How do you know Carter?
-Carter? -Cut the crap. We saw the photo.
translation.it: - "Carter"? - Finiscila. Abbiamo visto la foto. È lui che ci ha coinvolti nel gioco.

translation.en: He's the one who brought us into this game.
translation.it: Abbiamo visto la foto. È lui che ci ha coinvolti nel gioco.

translation.en: Yeah, right, okay. Carter, right.
Did he bring you into this, too?
translation.it: È lui che ha coinvolto anche te?

translation.en: No, he didn't. He didn't start this.
He was just one of my friends.
translation.it: È stato uno dei miei amici.

translation.en: We all went on a trip to Mexico and got really wasted.
translation.it: Siamo andati in Messico e ci siamo ubriacati.

translation.en: We found this old church, and we decided to party in it,
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto una festa in una vecchia chiesa

translation.en: and my roommate wanted to play truth or dare, so we did.
translation.it: e un'amica ha voluto giocare a obbligo o verità.

translation.en: But when we got home, the game, it just kept going.
translation.it: Ma quando siamo tornati a casa il gioco è continuato.

translation.en: My roommate died first, and then the other ones and--
translation.it: È morta la mia amica e poi…

translation.en: How is this possible?
I wish I knew.
I thought this was some kind of karmic payback for Sam trashing the place, you know?
translation.it: Una punizione karmica? Sam ha devastato la chiesa.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, Sam. He was one of my friends.
translation.it: Sì, era uno dei miei amici.

translation.en: He got really drunk, and he just started breaking stuff.
translation.it: Era ubriachissimo e ha iniziato a spaccare tutto.

translation.en: I don't know. We were all being idiots. I don't...
translation.it: Non lo so. Abbiamo tutti fatto gli idioti. Io non…

translation.en: Our friend just had a turn in the game. It wouldn't let her pick truth. Do you know why?
translation.it: Perché un'amica non ha potuto scegliere verità?

translation.en: It's how we played. We called it "two truths and a dare."
translation.it: Noi giocavamo a "due verità e un obbligo".

translation.en: If two people pick truth in a row, then the next person had to do a dare.
translation.it: Se due persone scelgono verità, a quella dopo tocca obbligo.

translation.en: Thought it was more fun that way.
More fun?
Your asshole buddy gave us a death sentence. Any more super dangerous rules you wanna tell us about?
translation.it: Lo stronzo del tuo amico ci ha condannati. Ci sono altre terribili regole?

translation.en: Easy, Pen.
He told me he was dared to find a new group to play.
translation.it: Aveva l'obbligo di trovare un nuovo gruppo con cui giocare.

translation.en: And that it had to be at the mission. He didn't have a choice, you know?
translation.it: E doveva avvenire nella chiesa. Non aveva scelta.

translation.en: Of course he did.
Okay, so where is Carter now?
I haven't talked to him since he went back to Mexico.
translation.it: Non lo sento da quando è tornato in Messico.

translation.en: I thought that when he got a new group to play, that we would be out.
translation.it: Con un nuovo gruppo, credevo che noi saremmo stati liberi.

translation.en: I can't believe he only got five of you to play.
If he would've gotten more,
then I would've had a longer time before I had to go again.
translation.it: avrei avuto più tempo prima che toccasse di nuovo a me.

translation.en: You got another turn?
translation.it: È toccato di nuovo a te?

translation.en: Okay. It's time to go, guys.
Is this why you're telling us the truth?
translation.it: Per questo ci dici la verità?

translation.en: No. I, uh... I picked dare.
Markie's right. Let's get out of here.
Okay, we're leaving. Come on, Olivia.
I am so sorry, Olivia.
How did you know my name when I got here?
translation.it: Come sapevi il mio nome quando sono arrivata?

translation.en: I didn't put it in the message.
-No! -[Olivia screams]
-[Lucas] No! -[Markie] Pen!
Brad! No! No!
-Hold her down! -I have to kill Olivia!
[Lucas] Stop moving.
[Brad] What the...
[Lucas] No! No!
[Brad] Oh, shit.
What was she thinking?
It wasn't her.
Something took over like she was possessed. She didn't finish her dare.
translation.it: - Sembrava posseduta. - Non ha completato l'obbligo.

translation.en: Like Ronnie. This is what happens.
So what do we do?
We tell the truth.
[Olivia] She was erratic, said she had to kill me.
translation.it: Era fuori di sé, voleva uccidermi.

translation.en: Then Penelope pushed me out of the way.
She shot her and then turned the gun on herself.
translation.it: ha sparato e poi si è sparata.

translation.en: Were you aware that Giselle Hammond was wanted for murder?
translation.it: Sapevate che era ricercata per omicidio?

translation.en: Yes.
Yeah, we thought that she knew someone that we were looking for.
translation.it: Pensavamo che conoscesse una persona che stiamo cercando.

translation.en: A guy that we met in Mexico, his name was Carter.
translation.it: Un certo Carter, conosciuto in Messico.

translation.en: You don't know his last name?
Any of these people look like him?
No, who are they?
Five of Giselle Hammond's friends.
All deceased.
Three suicides, two accidental deaths. All in three weeks.
translation.it: Tre suicidi, due morti accidentali, in tre settimane.

translation.en: And now you've lost two friends.
translation.it: Ora sono morti due vostri amici.

translation.en: I don't believe in coincidences, Olivia.
I think this is all connected. If you know how, you need to tell me.
translation.it: Credo che sia tutto collegato. Se sa come, deve dirmelo.

translation.en: No, I promise.
If I did know, I would.
I hope so.
We'll be in touch.
Don't take any more vacations.
That did not go well.
[Lucas] We told them the truth.
-As much as we could. -Guys,
the cops should be the least of our concerns.
translation.it: il problema non è la polizia.

translation.en: I mean, Penelope's dead, and Giselle gave us nothing.
translation.it: Penelope è morta e da Giselle non abbiamo ottenuto niente.

translation.en: She did say a new game had to start at the mission.
translation.it: Alla chiesa doveva iniziare un nuovo gioco.

translation.en: That place has to be the key.
[Officer Chang] Brad.
[sighs] Catch up with you guys later.
No, we shouldn't split up.
No, it's okay. My turn's not for a while.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Non tocca a me.

translation.en: I'll deal with my father. You deal with finding the mission.
translation.it: Io penso a mio padre, voi trovate la chiesa.

translation.en: Come on.
I think it was built in 1896.
Yeah, that really narrows it down.
It's a start.
Oh, shit. I gotta grab my charger.
I think you left your bag in my room.
translation.it: La tua borsa è nella mia stanza.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -What?
Check this out.
It says there was a massacre a few weeks later.
translation.it: CORPO DI PRETE MUTILATO NELLA CHIESA DI ROSARITO Qualche settimana dopo ci fu un massacro.

translation.en: "Only one survivor lives in the area. Inez Reyes, 19."
translation.it: "Solo una superstite, che vive nella zona. Inez Reyes, 19 anni."

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Truth or dare.
Where is she? Liv!
Hey! Hey!
[Markie] Olivia! Are you okay?
Where am I?
-Where am I? -What the hell are you...
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Are you okay?
Was that your turn?
[Lucas] Hey! Hey! Come back! Come back!
Olivia, what did he say?
He dared me to sleep with Lucas.
translation.it: Mi ha obbligato ad andare a letto con Lucas.

translation.en: Why would you pick dare?
Because of what Giselle said.
translation.it: Per ciò che ha detto Giselle.

translation.en: If I picked truth,
I was just forcing someone else to pick dare.
How noble.
Markie, I didn't know that's what it would ask.
translation.it: Markie, non sapevo cosa mi avrebbe chiesto.

translation.en: I don't think he knew where he was.
-Are you guys okay? -Yeah, I'm perfect.
Well, hey, hey! Where are you going?
Anywhere but here.
What is going on?
Why don't you ask Olivia?
translation.it: Perché non lo chiedi a Olivia?

translation.en: Will you please tell me what the hell is going on?
I got my turn.
Yeah, and?
Whoa. Hey, no. What are we doing?
Oh, this is the dare.
I'm sorry.
Why didn't you pick truth?
I told Markie it was so that you guys wouldn't have to,
translation.it: Ho detto a Markie che l'ho fatto perché non toccasse a voi,

translation.en: but that was a lie.
I chose dare because there is something that I can never tell Markie,
translation.it: C'è una cosa che non posso dire a Markie

translation.en: and I'm really afraid the game's gonna make me do it.
translation.it: e il gioco potrebbe obbligarmi a farlo.

translation.en: It can't be that bad.
You have no idea.
-[grunts] -What?
No, you're just doing this because of the dare.
translation.it: No, lo fai solo per l'obbligo,

translation.en: Because you have to.
No, you have to.
I don't.
[in distorted voice] Look at me.
Truth or dare?
Truth or dare?
[choking] Truth!
Who are you truly in love with?
translation.it: Di chi sei innamorato, in realtà?

translation.en: I care about you. I do.
I'm in love with Markie.
Liv, I'm sorry. It was the game.
No, it was the truth.
[Markie on video] Roy Cameron, 45 years old, attempts to make dinner.
translation.it: Roy Cameron, 45 anni, prova a preparare la cena.

translation.en: Take one.
Whoa. A little faith, please?
Nobody makes a steak like your old man.
translation.it: Nessuno cucina le bistecche come tuo padre.

translation.en: [Markie] Wait. Dad, I'm pescatarian now.
I know, honey.
Dad?
I miss you so much.
I miss you, too.
There's something that I've been dying to ask you.
translation.it: C'è una cosa che muoio dalla voglia di chiederti.

translation.en: -She's not answering. -[Lucas] Wait.
Come here. Look at this.
There's no number, but she lives in Tijuana.
translation.it: Niente numero, ma vive a Tijuana.

translation.en: That's less than three hours away.
translation.it: È a meno di tre ore da qui.

translation.en: Who is she?
She's someone who might be able to help us.
Come on.
[Roy in distorted voice] Come on, sweetheart.
Time to pick.
Truth.
The gun I used to kill myself,
translation.it: La pistola che ho usato per spararmi,

translation.en: why do you keep it?
Sometimes, I think about using it.
Maybe you should get it.
[Lucas] I'm worried about Markie.
translation.it: CONFINE DEL MESSICO 2,4 KM Temo per Markie.

translation.en: I wish we would have found her before we left.
translation.it: Vorrei che l'avessimo trovata prima di partire.

translation.en: Well, she doesn't want to speak to me right now, so there's nothing we can do.
translation.it: Non vuole parlarmi ora, perciò non possiamo fare niente.

translation.en: You know that secret that you're keeping from her?
translation.it: Se le dicessi il segreto che non vuoi rivelarle,

translation.en: Maybe if you got it out, the game couldn't use it against you.
translation.it: forse il gioco non potrebbe usarlo contro di noi.

translation.en: No, no one can ever know.
Especially not Markie. It would kill her.
I'll try her again when we get there.
-Um... -[in English] Can I help you?
Sorry. Um, we're looking for Inez Reyes.
She's my grandmother. I watch after her.
translation.it: È mia nonna. Mi occupo io di lei.

translation.en: We were just wondering if we could speak to her.
She speaks to no one.
No, please.
Our friends are dying, just like hers did. We just need a few words.
translation.it: I nostri amici stanno morendo, come sono morti i suoi. Pochi minuti.

translation.en: I will ask.
And if you could show her this.
Show her that we were at this mission
translation.it: Le dica che eravamo nella chiesa

translation.en: and that half the people in this photo are now dead.
translation.it: e metà delle persone in questa foto sono morte.

translation.en: Then maybe she'll talk to us.
She might see you. But she will not speak to you.
translation.it: Forse accetterà di vedervi, ma non vi parlerà.

translation.en: She has not said a word in 50 years.
translation.it: Non dice una parola da 50 anni.

translation.en: Wait here.
She must have taken a vow of silence, right?
She was 19 when her friends were butchered. Imagine what that did to her.
translation.it: Aveva 19 anni quando i suoi amici furono trucidati.

translation.en: I don't have to.
translation.it: Non ce n'è bisogno, lo so.

translation.en: It's been over an hour.
Yeah, for someone who doesn't speak, they seem to be doing a lot of talking.
translation.it: Già, per una che non parla, stanno discutendo parecchio.

translation.en: She will see you.
I'm sorry for the wait.
She has written something for you.
translation.it: Ha scritto una cosa per voi.

translation.en: What is it?
[girl] She would not let me read it.
translation.it: Non ha voluto che lo leggessi.

translation.en: [in English] Thank you for seeing us, Ms. Reyes.
translation.it: Grazie per aver accettato, sig.ra Reyes.

translation.en: "The mission was a convent where young women went to find God.
translation.it: "La chiesa era un convento dove le giovani trovavano Dio.

translation.en: We were girls, so we played silly games like hide-and-seek.
translation.it: Eravamo ragazze e facevamo giochi stupidi come nascondino.

translation.en: But the priest who ran the convent forced us to play his own game.
translation.it: Ma il prete che gestiva il convento ci costrinse a fare il suo gioco.

translation.en: He let us hide, but then he took the one he found.
translation.it: Ci faceva nascondere e poi prendeva quella che trovava.

translation.en: His pleasure was our pain.
translation.it: Il suo piacere era il nostro dolore.

translation.en: We suffered in silence.
Then one of the girls told a secret.
She knew spells that could call spirits,
translation.it: Conosceva delle formule per invocare gli spiriti

translation.en: so she summoned a demon named Calux.
translation.it: e invocò uno spirito chiamato Calux.

translation.en: He possessed our game."
translation.it: Lui si impossessò del nostro gioco."

translation.en: Possessed the game?
"Demons possess people, places,
objects, even ideas."
"Calux is a trickster.
That night, when the priest found his victim,
translation.it: Quella sera, il prete trovò la sua vittima

translation.en: she was possessed by Calux.
translation.it: e lei fu posseduta da Calux.

translation.en: She hid the priest's body in the mission
translation.it: Nascose il corpo del prete in chiesa,

translation.en: in pieces.
It took them a week to find his head.
translation.it: Ci misero una settimana a trovare la testa.

translation.en: But Calux didn't want to stop. He made us keep playing.
translation.it: Ma Calux non voleva smettere. Ci costrinse a giocare.

translation.en: Many of my sisters died."
Wait. How did you and the others escape?
"The person who released the demon
can trap it with a simple ritual.
translation.it: può fermarlo con un semplice rito.

translation.en: But only by his own hand."
translation.it: Ma può farlo solo quella persona."

translation.en: Uh... This is the spell?
It's in Spanish.
"The spell must be repeated seven times,
and a sacrifice must be placed in a pot sealed with wax.
translation.it: e un sacrificio va posto in un barattolo chiuso con la cera.

translation.en: As long as the pot stays sealed in the mission,
translation.it: Finché il barattolo resta nella chiesa, chiuso,

translation.en: the door we opened for Calux will also be sealed."
translation.it: Finché il barattolo resta nella chiesa, chiuso, la porta che aprimmo per Calux resta chiusa."

translation.en: Wait. I've seen that pot before.
[gasps] Yeah.
Look. When I saw it, it was broken,
translation.it: Guarda. Quando l'ho visto era rotto

translation.en: and there was something inside it, and it smelled rotten.
translation.it: e c'era qualcosa dentro che puzzava di marcio.

translation.en: "Whoever broke the pot will have to do the same."
translation.it: CHI HA ROTTO IL VASO DEVE FARE LO STESSO "Chi ha rotto il vaso deve fare lo stesso."

translation.en: What was it?
The sacrifice?
It was you who summoned the demon?
translation.it: Fu lei a invocare il demone?

translation.en: It's been a few years since AP Spanish, but I think it says,
translation.it: Il mio spagnolo è un po' arrugginito, ma credo che dica:

translation.en: "I have called upon an evil.
Silence my voice so the evil is no more."
translation.it: metti a tacere la mia voce e ferma lo spirito."

translation.en: So when Carter and his friends broke the pot at the mission--
translation.it: Quando hanno rotto il vaso in chiesa…

translation.en: The demon was freed and possessed their game of truth or dare.
translation.it: Il demone si è impossessato del nostro gioco.

translation.en: And we have to find whoever broke that pot.
translation.it: Troviamo chi ha rotto il vaso.

translation.en: Giselle said somebody named Sam trashed the place.
translation.it: Un certo Sam ha devastato la chiesa.

translation.en: Yeah, and we have no idea who Sam is.
Or if he's even still alive.
And if we do find him...
What? "Hi, Sam, do you mind cutting out your tongue
translation.it: gli diciamo: "Sam. Possiamo tagliarti la lingua

translation.en: and sealing it in this lovely handmade pot?"
translation.it: per metterla in questo magnifico vasetto?"

translation.en: I'll check Giselle's Facebook again, see if there's a Sam tagged.
translation.it: Ricontrollo se nel profilo di Giselle c'è taggato Sam.

translation.en: Still nothing from Markie?
She's ignoring all my texts.
Her turn is next. I'm gonna try calling her again.
translation.it: Tra poco toccherà a lei. Provo a richiamarla.

translation.en: [Officer Chang] Brad?
-Brad! It's your father. -[sighs]
Since Penelope, he's been...
translation.it: Dopo la storia di Penelope, lui…

translation.en: I'll get rid of him.
Let's talk outside.
[Officer] I'm gonna grab a coffee.
Look, uh, I'm hearing some things about your friend's murder.
translation.it: Ho saputo delle cose sull'omicidio della tua amica.

translation.en: Kranis in homicide isn't convinced it's so simple.
translation.it: Kranis della omicidi non crede che sia così semplice.

translation.en: I know I don't need to ask this, but...
translation.it: So che non dovrei chiedertelo, ma…

translation.en: Is there something you're not telling us?
No, I promise. Everything we told you was true.
translation.it: No, lo giuro. Ti ho detto tutta la verità.

translation.en: Markie, thank God!
Why are you telling me all this?
'Cause I know Kranis is wrong,
translation.it: Perché so che Kranis si sbaglia

translation.en: and I want you to know what's going on.
translation.it: e voglio sapere cosa sta succedendo.

translation.en: Look, you don't have to worry.
I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.
translation.it: Non permetterò che ti accada qualcosa.

translation.en: You're still my son, Brad.
You gonna get that?
Get what?
[voice on radio] Truth or dare, Brad?
[Markie] Yeah, I guess I just needed some time alone.
translation.it: Già, volevo stare un po' da sola.

translation.en: No, no, no. It's fine.
Just get here as fast as you can. And please be careful.
translation.it: Ma vieni qui il prima possibile. E sta' attenta.

translation.en: Your turn's next.
I had my turn.
I chose truth.
So did Lucas.
And if the both of you picked truth...
translation.it: E se voi due avete scelto verità…

translation.en: [voice] You only have one choice.
You sure there's nothing you didn't tell me?
translation.it: Sicuro che non devi dirmi niente?

translation.en: I dare you to steal his gun
translation.it: Ti obbligo a rubargli la pistola

translation.en: and make him beg for his life.
translation.it: e a farti implorare di non ucciderlo.

translation.en: Son?
Thank you, Dad,
for everything.
It's just, uh...
There's just one more thing I need to do, and I hope you can forgive me.
translation.it: C'è un'altra cosa che devo fare. Ti prego, perdonami.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Of course.
For what?
It's okay.
I need you to beg.
-For your life. -The hell are you doing?
translation.it: - Di non ucciderti. - Ma che fai?

translation.en: [Brad] Beg for your life!
Brad, please put the gun down!
-Just do as I say... -You don't have to do this.
...or I'll die. Get on your knees.
We have to go. Now!
Do as I say. I'll explain everything, okay?
translation.it: Fa' come dico, poi ti spiegherò.

translation.en: -I know I've been hard on you. I'm sorry. -Listen. No!
translation.it: - So che sono stato duro con te, scusa. - No!

translation.en: That's not what this is about.
Beg! Please, I'll explain everything. Just beg.
I guess you think I deserve this.
translation.it: Credi che io me lo meriti.

translation.en: No! No.
Just beg!
Please! Just beg, and I'll put down the gun.
translation.it: Implorami e metto giù la pistola.

translation.en: -What's that gonna prove, Brad? -Just beg!
-Beg-- -[gun fires]
translation.it: E metto giù la pistola! Implorami!

translation.en: No, no! No!
[Olivia] Brad!
Brad, no, no, no. No!
[Olivia] No! No!
Get a paramedic.
Come on.
Brad! Brad! No, no, no.
Stay here. You're gonna be fine.
No! No!
I need a paramedic. Help!
I need a paramedic! Brad!
[Markie] I'm so sorry.
Guys, can we get out of here?
I still need to talk to the detective.
translation.it: Devo ancora parlare con il detective.

translation.en: -I shouldn't have picked truth. -[Lucas] No.
It's not your fault. I picked truth, too.
We shouldn't have left Brad alone.
No, it wouldn't have mattered.
This game is smart. It's too smart. We're not playing it.
translation.it: Il gioco è troppo furbo. Non stiamo giocando noi.

translation.en: It's playing us. And none of this is a coincidence.
translation.it: È lui che decide. E niente è una coincidenza.

translation.en: It waits for our most vulnerable moments, and that's when it asks us.
translation.it: Attende che siamo vulnerabili per darci gli ordini.

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Yeah, you got that right, Olivia.
And now it's your turn.
Truth or dare?
What?
What is it?
Lucas just asked me.
[in normal voice] No, I didn't.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Olivia?
[Markie] Okay.
Okay, you have to pick truth.
Olivia, do it.
-Dare. -[Markie] Olivia.
I dare you
to tell Markie the secret you fear most.
translation.it: a dire a Markie il segreto che temi di più.

translation.en: What? What is it making you do?
translation.it: Cosa ti ha chiesto di fare?

translation.en: Markie, there's something important I need to tell you.
translation.it: Markie, devo dirti una cosa importante.

translation.en: [whispers] What?
I was there the night your dad died. I know what happened.
translation.it: La notte che tuo padre è morto, io ero lì. So cos'è successo.

translation.en: What?
What are you talking about?
I had gotten into a fight with my parents, so I went to your house.
translation.it: Avevo litigato con i miei e sono andata a casa tua.

translation.en: You weren't there, so your dad let me in.
translation.it: Tu non c'eri e tuo padre mi ha fatta entrare.

translation.en: He was drinking, and he offered me one, so I took it.
translation.it: Stava bevendo, mi ha offerto un drink e ho accettato.

translation.en: We had a few, and then he told me that he had been fired that day
translation.it: Abbiamo bevuto un po' e mi ha detto che l'avevano licenziato

translation.en: 'cause he was drinking on the job.
And I just... I felt really bad for him. [sniffles]
translation.it: Mi è dispiaciuto molto per lui.

translation.en: But I told him that you and I would help him figure things out.
translation.it: Ma gli ho detto che io e te l'avremmo aiutato a venirne fuori.

translation.en: And then he called me beautiful.
translation.it: Poi ha detto che ero bellissima.

translation.en: I was drunk, and I didn't know what to do, and then he leaned in to kiss me...
translation.it: Ero ubriaca, non sapevo cosa fare. Lui si è avvicinato per baciarmi…

translation.en: I tried to push him off. I didn't do it, but he...
translation.it: Provavo ad allontanarlo, ma non ci riuscivo e…

translation.en: [sniffles] He kept coming back stronger.
translation.it: E lui insisteva sempre di più.

translation.en: Finally, I got free.
translation.it: Alla fine sono riuscita a liberarmi.

translation.en: He begged me to forgive him,
said that he needed help, but I was so scared,
translation.it: diceva che gli serviva aiuto, avevo paura.

translation.en: and I was confused.
And I threatened to tell you what happened,
translation.it: così l'ho minacciato di dirti tutto,

translation.en: but he said that he would die if you ever found out.
translation.it: ma lui ha risposto che sarebbe morto se tu l'avessi scoperto.

translation.en: I told him that you'd be better off if he were dead.
translation.it: Gli ho detto che tu saresti stata meglio se fosse morto.

translation.en: Markie, I am so sorry.
I wanted to tell you, but by the time I got a hold of you,
translation.it: Volevo dirtelo, ma quando sono arrivata da te,

translation.en: he had already done it, and you were devastated.
translation.it: lui si era già suicidato e tu eri distrutta.

translation.en: It broke my heart. I didn't know what to do. Trust me. I--
translation.it: Mi ha spezzato il cuore. Non sapevo cosa fare, credimi…

translation.en: No, I'll never trust you again.
translation.it: No, non ti crederò mai più.

translation.en: Don't!
Don't.
[Kranis] Miss Barron,
you're up.
[Kranis] "I know the game dared you to set that woman on fire.
translation.it: "So che il gioco ti ha obbligata a dar fuoco a quella donna.

translation.en: Tell me where to meet you, or I'll wait outside your family's house
translation.it: Dimmi dove possiamo vederci o ti aspetterò fuori da casa dei tuoi

translation.en: until the game dares me to do the same to them."
translation.it: finché il gioco non mi obbligherà a farlo a loro."

translation.en: That is quite a threat.
We traced the IP to your laptop.
translation.it: Siamo risaliti all'IP del suo computer.

translation.en: [stammers] I know that that looks bad,
but I just needed to get her attention.
translation.it: ma volevo solo la sua attenzione.

translation.en: Yeah, I know you're playing some kind of truth or dare game,
translation.it: State giocando a una specie di obbligo o verità,

translation.en: but what I don't understand is, why are people dying?
translation.it: State giocando a una specie di obbligo o verità, ma non capisco il perché di queste morti.

translation.en: There's only four of you left.
I'd like to keep the rest of you guys alive.
translation.it: Vorrei che non moriste anche voi.

translation.en: Four?
Everyone who's dead was in Mexico.
translation.it: Chi è morto è stato in Messico.

translation.en: That leaves you, Markie and Lucas, and Giselle's friend, Sam Meehan.
translation.it: Siete in quattro: lei, Markie, Lucas e Sam Meehan, l'amico di Giselle.

translation.en: Wait. He's alive?
You know him?
That's just someone that Giselle had mentioned.
translation.it: Ma Giselle ha parlato di lui.

translation.en: He's holed up in an apartment. Won't talk to anybody.
translation.it: È chiuso in un appartamento, non parla con nessuno.

translation.en: Said I had to arrest him if I wanted to speak to him again.
translation.it: Mi ha detto che avrei dovuto arrestarlo per parlarci di nuovo.

translation.en: Olivia, what the hell is happening here?
Could I get some water, please?
Thanks.
[Kranis] Officer, I need a glass of water.
-[camera clicks] -[woman] Yes, sir, right away.
Am I being charged?
Not yet.
Okay. Then I need to go.
Carter is Sam.
He was using a fake name.
But Giselle acted like they were different people?
translation.it: Giselle fingeva che fossero due persone.

translation.en: Well, she was probably trying to protect him,
but she slipped up, and she used his real name. Come on.
translation.it: ma si è tradita e ha usato il suo vero nome.

translation.en: Markie, please open the door. We need to talk.
translation.it: Markie, apri la porta. Dobbiamo parlare.

translation.en: What are you doing?
What my father did.
translation.it: Ciò che ha fatto mio padre.

translation.en: Markie, please put it down.
[sobs] Why?
I don't have anything.
You have me.
-No, the game has us. -[cocks gun]
translation.it: No, siamo in balia del gioco.

translation.en: I hid the truth about your dad to protect you.
translation.it: Ti ho nascosto la verità su tuo padre per proteggerti.

translation.en: But I was wrong.
Every single day, I wish I could take back what I said to him.
translation.it: Ho desiderato ogni giorno di poter cancellare ciò che gli ho detto.

translation.en: He tried before.
It's not your fault.
We can't change the past.
But we can still have a future. We can end this game.
translation.it: Ma possiamo avere un futuro. Possiamo far finire il gioco.

translation.en: How?
Carter. I know where he is.
Okay, so what's the plan?
We just have to get him back to the mission.
Okay, so don't open with, "We need you to cut out your own tongue"?
translation.it: Non esordire dicendo: "Dobbiamo tagliarti la lingua".

translation.en: Here it is. Six.
[Carter] Go away! I don't wanna talk to anyone.
translation.it: Andatevene. Non voglio parlare con nessuno.

translation.en: Screw this.
-You... -[Olivia] Carter!
Or is it Sam?
-How did you find me? -We were motivated.
-What the hell happened in here? -The game.
No contact with the outside.
Nothing in here can hurt me.
This is your plan?
My plan is to wait it out.
translation.it: Il piano è aspettare la fine.

translation.en: No, that was your second plan.
translation.it: No, quello era il tuo piano B.

translation.en: Your first plan was to screw us.
Three of my best friends are dead because of you!
translation.it: Tre dei miei amici sono morti per colpa tua!

translation.en: I'm sorry. I lost friends, too, okay?
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Anche i miei amici sono morti.

translation.en: If I could take it all back, I would.
There is a way.
translation.it: Potessi, tornerei indietro. Un modo c'è.

translation.en: But we all have to go back to the mission.
A way to what? To what, end the game? How?
translation.it: Un modo per far finire il gioco? Come?

translation.en: Just trust me.
We have to go back.
Uh-uh...
No, this is another dare, right? The game is daring you to lure me out.
translation.it: È uno degli obblighi, vero? Il gioco vi obbliga a farmi uscire.

translation.en: -Is that-- -No.
She's telling the truth.
And why should I trust you?
Because we want the same thing.
We wanna survive.
Look.
I'm gonna tell you what you should have told me at the bar.
translation.it: Ti dirò ciò che avresti dovuto dirmi al bancone.

translation.en: Piss off.
Okay, sweet, little Olivia's not shooting anyone.
translation.it: La dolce Olivia non sparerà a nessuno.

translation.en: Try me. I dare you.
[Lucas] Come on. Let's go.
Is this ritual that old nun told you about actually gonna work?
translation.it: Il rito di cui ha parlato la suora funzionerà?

translation.en: [Olivia] There's only one way to find out.
translation.it: C'è un solo modo per scoprirlo.

translation.en: So we're gonna end this with a seance?
[Olivia] We are not ending it.
You are.
Me?
I tried.
[chuckles] We all know how that turned out.
-Stay down. -[coughs]
Here, take this. Take it.
Say it seven times.
What are you gonna do with that?
I'm giving it to you.
Take it now!
Now say the words seven times.
translation.it: Ora ripeti la formula sette volte.

translation.en: Go!
Did you feel that?
[Olivia] Don't stop.
-Just tell me what's going on! -Keep going!
[Carter] All right. Uh, uh...
Say it again.
Five more times.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Lucas?
Dare.
-Where are you going? -Just gotta get away from here.
translation.it: - Dove vai? - Devo uscire da qui.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait!
You can't go. Your turn's next.
translation.it: Non puoi andartene. Tocca a te.

translation.en: I just had my turn.
-Gotta get away from you both. -Why?
Because it dared me to choose.
You already have. You love Markie!
Choose which one of you to kill.
What, so he's just leaving?
translation.it: E quindi se ne va così?

translation.en: Don't stop. Two more times.
[Markie] Luke!
Why did you pick dare?
Because I knew if I didn't, then one of you would have to.
translation.it: Altrimenti sarebbe toccato a una di voi due.

translation.en: And we're so close.
And I won't let the game kill you.
translation.it: Non permetterò che il gioco vi uccida.

translation.en: You're such an idiot.
What can I say?
You do that to me.
That's seven. We gotta get out of here.
This place is coming down.
No, there's one more thing to do.
Pick up the knife.
I can't do it for you.
Pick it up!
And do what?
I'm so sorry, Sam.
But you unleashed this evil, which means you're the only one who can stop it.
translation.it: Ma tu hai scatenato il demone, perciò solo tu puoi fermarlo.

translation.en: I need you to cut out your tongue.
No! That's insane.
Please! It's the only way we survive.
You take care of each other.
No, no!
[Olivia] Do it.
Lucas, stop!
That's not Lucas.
Do it now, Carter!
-[rumbling] -Before it's too late.
Don't you wanna live?
You do not have a choice! Do it!
I can't believe I'm about to do this.
translation.it: Non ci credo, sto per farlo.

translation.en: [in distorted voice] I will murder everyone you've ever known.
No! They are not in this. It's just us!
translation.it: No! Loro non c'entrano. Riguarda solo noi!

translation.en: You're right. But Lucas is.
And he didn't do his dare.
translation.it: E non ha eseguito il suo obbligo.

translation.en: So now he dies.
[Olivia] No...
Lucas refused his dare to save us.
We have to finish this.
[Markie] Calux killed Carter. The spell won't work.
translation.it: Calux ha ucciso Carter. La formula non funzionerà.

translation.en: No, we lost the second we started this game.
translation.it: No, abbiamo perso quando abbiamo iniziato a giocare.

translation.en: The second we came here.
Carter was dared to bring us here
because this is where you can add new people to the game.
translation.it: Perché qui si aggiungono persone al gioco.

translation.en: I have an idea.
Your turn's next. When you're asked, I need you to pick dare.
translation.it: Ora tocca a te. Devi scegliere obbligo.

translation.en: Why would I do that?
[Lucas, in distorted voice] Markie...
Truth or dare?
[sobbing] Now Lucas is asking me.
Pick dare.
translation.it: Me lo sta chiedendo Lucas. Scegli obbligo.

translation.en: What? I'll die!
translation.it: Ma non eseguirlo. Cosa? Così morirò!

translation.en: Markie,
I am so sorry for keeping that secret from you for so long.
translation.it: Mi spiace non averti rivelato quel segreto per così tanto tempo.

translation.en: And I swear to you I will never ever keep anything from you again.
translation.it: E ti giuro che non ti terrò più nascosto nient'altro.

translation.en: But we survive this only if we trust each other.
translation.it: Ma sopravviveremo solo fidandoci l'una dell'altra.

translation.en: Okay?
Okay.
Trust me.
[Lucas] You have to pick.
Dare.
I dare you to shoot Olivia.
translation.it: Ti obbligo a sparare a Olivia.

translation.en: He wants me to shoot you.
You gotta trust me, Markie. Don't do it.
translation.it: Fidati di me, Markie. Non farlo.

translation.en: This is the only way to save us both.
Okay.
I trust you.
I won't do it.
Dare complete, Calux.
Your turn.
Truth or dare?
[in distorted voice] I'm not in this game.
No, once you're asked, you're in. Those are the rules, right?
translation.it: Se ti viene fatta la domanda, giochi. È la regola, giusto?

translation.en: So truth or dare, asshole?
Truth.
How do we get out of this game alive?
translation.it: Come usciamo vivi da questo gioco?

translation.en: You can't.
Carter was the only one who could stop this.
translation.it: Carter era l'unico che poteva farlo finire.

translation.en: So now the game won't end until all the players are dead.
translation.it: Ora il gioco continuerà finché non moriranno tutti i giocatori.

translation.en: And your turn's next.
Unless you find some new friends to play with.
translation.it: A meno che non trovi dei nuovi amici con cui giocare.

translation.en: But that's not gonna happen, is it?
[in normal voice] Your arm.
I'm okay.
Well, did it work?
It's not over.
The game will never end, not as long as we're alive.
translation.it: Il gioco non finirà mai, finché noi siamo in vita.

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm choosing you.
[Olivia on video] My friends and I went on a trip to Mexico for spring break.
translation.it: Io e i miei amici siamo andati in vacanza in Messico.

translation.en: We ended up in an old mission where we played a game of truth or dare.
translation.it: Siamo finiti in una vecchia chiesa a giocare a obbligo o verità.

translation.en: We had no idea that we had encountered an unspeakable evil
translation.it: Non sapevamo di andare incontro a uno spirito maligno

translation.en: that wanted to play with us.
When we went home, the game kept going.
translation.it: Quando siamo tornati a casa, il gioco è continuato.

translation.en: It killed five of my friends.
translation.it: Ha ucciso cinque dei miei amici.

translation.en: The game is real.
Tell the truth, do the dare, or you die.
translation.it: Di' la verità, esegui l'obbligo o morirai.

translation.en: Refuse to play, you die.
It can happen anywhere.
And it can come from anyone.
translation.it: E la domanda può arrivare da chiunque.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, but I have to ask you.
translation.it: Mi dispiace tanto, ma devo chiedervelo.

translation.en: Truth or dare?
translation.it: OBBLIGO O VERITÀ Obbligo o verità?
